item.title: Republican Senator Introduces Federal Ban On Mutilating Trans Procedures For Children
item.description: Sen. Marshall introduced a federal ban on mutilating transgender procedures for minors that would punish anyone who performs such procedures.

item.title: Newsom rails against Trump's 25% tariff plan during southern border visit: 'It's a betrayal'
